history.proof: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx. induction x. - intros y Hyp. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_cons_inv. apply in_app_iff. hauto use: incl_l_nil, in_app_or unfold: incl. - qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_cons_inv.

ctx: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.
intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), a :: l <<= m -> a el m /\\ l <<= m" on hypothesis of type "l1 <<= l2".

ctx: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable a.

ctx: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.
intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.

ctx: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx.

original: intros l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2 x Hx. induction x. - intros y Hyp. induction Hyp. + apply incl_cons_inv in Hl1. destruct Hl1 as [Hl1' _]. apply Hl1'. now left. + apply incl_cons_inv in Hl1. destruct Hl1 as [_ Hl1']. right. apply Hl1'. auto. - intros y [Hin1 | Hin2]. + apply incl_cons_inv in Hl1. destruct Hl1 as [Hl1' _]. left. apply Hl1'. auto. + apply incl_cons_inv in Hl1. destruct Hl1 as [_ Hl1']. right. apply Hl2, Hl1'. auto.
